revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=ReadyNAS 2120 |revision=v2 |upc=606449103151 |asin=B00MQK1Y7K |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=09/2014 |type=NAS enclosure |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=C13 |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=MV78230 |cpu1_cspeed=1.6 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=SK hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR-BC |fla2=1 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L2006EM1I-12G |fla2_num=2 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G83GFR-RDC |ram1_num=8 |expansion_if_types=eSATA 2.0, USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATA 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=6 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, J6 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1318 |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1318 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=I2C Real Time Clock;Intersil;ISL12057;;1;,,, USB 3.0 / xHCI Host Controller;Fresco Logic;FL1009;;1;,,, SATA 6Gb/s Host Controller;Marvell;88SE9170;;2;,,, Digital Temperature Sensor;Global Mixed-mode Technology;G751-2f;;1;,,, PWM Fan Controller;GMT;G762;;3;,,, 4x Linear 12V Fan Driver;GMT;G9941;;3;,,, Single Synchronous Step-Down Controller;TI;TPS51218;;1;,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;88PG847B;;1;,,, Synchronous Switching Regulator Controller;Marvell;88PH8101;;1;,,, 18V 8A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MPQ8632GLE-8;;1;,,, 16V 3A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1493;;1;,,, 30V 8.8A P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS4435BZ;;1;,,, 30V 21A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDMS8888;;1;,,, 30V 42A N-Channel SyncFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDMS0312S;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDMS7692;;2;,,, Four Output Differential Buffer for PCIe;Renesas;ICS9DB403D;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, eSATA, Link Aggregation, SNMP, fan, heatsink, metal case |stock_os=Linux;4.4.218.armada.1;ReadyNASOS 6.10.5 |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui_eth=E8:FC:AF }} {{TagLine|1U 4-Bay ReadyNAS Rackmount Storage}} :[https://www.netgear.com/support/product/RN21241E.aspx Support page] :[https://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/GPL/ReadyNASOS_WW_src_V6.10.5.zip Latest GPL Source] "RN2120 MB V3.0" is silkscreened on the main board "RN2120 Front Board V2.0 E2" is silkscreened on the front board ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' MV78230 @1.6GHz Dual Core (ARM v7) *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 128MB NAND Flash, 4x SATA, 2x eSATA *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 *Power: 120-240V via C13 ==Images== ---- File:Netgear RN2120v2 Main Top.jpeg|Main Board Top File:Netgear RN2120v2 Main Bottom.jpeg|Main Board Bottom File:Netgear RN2120v2 Front Board.jpeg|Front Board File:Netgear RN2120v2 Internal View.jpeg|Internal View [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
